participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, enjoys exploring new things and meeting people.
participant_1.background: Hey there, I am 23 and I love food. I have been trying all types of food everywhere I go. I own a yacht and I rent it out when I am not using it. I also like to cook but I am not very good at it. I've been traveling the world for a year.

participant_2.name: Robert
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and disillusioned, recently facing personal challenges but looking for a way to improve his situation.
participant_2.background: I'm 40 years old. I hate my job. My wife spends all my money. I work as a car salesman. I'm planning on getting a divorce.

content.text: You are worse than my wife...
I can see you reading my messages, you know
